BOEM Wind Energy Area Block polygons

Source: R/data.R
boem_blocks.Rd

BOEM Wind Energy Area Block polygons

boem_blocks

Format

A spatial features (sf) data frame with 5,596 features and 24 fields:

block_id

unique block identifier (integer)

block_key

unique block identifier (character), comprised of {zone_key}{PROTRACTION_NUMBER}_{BLOCK_NUMBER}

block_type

one of either "lease" or "plan" depending on data source

zone_key

unique zone from oh_zones containing the block

PROTRACTION_NUMBER

the BOEM area defined by the roughly 2° longitude by 1° latitude containing up to 1,200 blocks. Computed using the International UTM Zone Numbering system, e.g. NJ is North (N); Lat 36-40° (J); 18 is UTM zone 18; and 02 is the 2nd of 12 possible maps

BLOCK_NUMBER

Each whole block is approximately 3 nautical miles (nm) by 3 nm. For renewable energy purposes only, blocks can be leased down to the 16th of a block.

BLOCK_LABEL
SUB_BLOCK
lease_LEASE_NUMBER
lease_LEASE_TYPE
lease_RESOURCE
lease_COMPANY
lease_LEASE_DATE
lease_LEASE_TERM
lease_PROJECT_EASEMENT
lease_STATE
lease_PROTRACTION_NAME
lease_LEASE_DOCUMENT1
lease_LEASE_DOCUMENT2
plan_ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION
plan_CATEGORY1
plan_CATEGORY2
plan_URL1
plan_URL2
area_km2

area of zone in square kilometers

geom

geometry in geographic coordinate system (EPSG: 4326)

Source

  • Renewable Energy GIS Data | Bureau of Ocean Energy Management
